title: Lucian is the king of bot lane.
body: He doesn't do anything and gets served by everyone.

replies.body:
Lucian can be really great with a good support who is able to lockdown someone for his ult. That being said....He is lackluster in almost all other departments. 

{{champion:201}} Will make your ult completely useless, and I mean 100% useless.
{{champion:67}} Will just tumble away and you'll never land it.
{{champion:51}} Will net away and your ult is useless.

{{champion:201}} Recieves still recieves damage, so it's not "100% useless"
{{champion:67}}  can tumble but can't {{champion:236}} use his E?
{{champion:236}} can use his E but {{champion:104}} can't have his cigar?

> [{quoted}](name=butelka herbaty,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mBpHJ5j4,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-09-30T20:55:34.402+0000)
>
> {{champion:201}} Recieves still recieves damage, so it's not "100% useless"
> {{champion:67}}  can tumble but can't {{champion:236}} use his E?

The amount of damage Braum receives is extremely miniscule A full Lucian ult to a walled braum can't even drop him by 5% health. And if I'm not mistake Vayne can tumble twice during the length of Lucian's ult.

Don't get me wrong I'm not saying Lucian is weak or needs buffs, but he def needs a power shift.
When was his ult where he power is? If I recall his ult is useless if you're in the auto attack range needed.

How witty~

Basically "I see what you did there."
Thank you.
http://www.tegile.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/captain-obvious-breathing-300x273.png
Vayne and Jinx must be the common serfs then, considering there are hundreds of them, and they serve nearly everyone.

I think there's another name for that.

Sorry not sorry.
Escort?

Lucian is fine. I've been maiming him for about a month now. His damage is actually pretty damn high, his burst is great. I mean he truly is a lane bully 

Please don't buff him and make him perma banned. I love playing him ^.^
i doubt he will be permabanned if {{champion:67}} isnt

> [{quoted}](name=EmperorGilgamesh,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mBpHJ5j4,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2015-09-30T23:48:30.433+0000)
>
> i doubt he will be permabanned if {{champion:67}} isnt

why does everything have to be compared to vayne. this is getting old to be honest. I know shes overplayed and maybe overtuned, but lucian can easiliy beat vayne in lane. lucian to me does not feel underpowered in any sense. the IE > ghostblade route on him with armor pen reds is an insane mid game spike where you can melt just about anyone who hasnt built armor.
vayne actually makes sense here because she is one of his greatest counters. vayne being a very common pick is one of the reasons why lucian is considered shit tier right now.
at the moment she is the best adc right now since every other adc is nerfed....so comparing lucain to her like any other adc would be appropriate.

> [{quoted}](name=Chuck Charles,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mBpHJ5j4,comment-id=000e00000000,timestamp=2015-09-30T23:52:25.282+0000)
>
> why does everything have to be compared to vayne. this is getting old to be honest. I know shes overplayed and maybe overtuned, but lucian can easiliy beat vayne in lane. lucian to me does not feel underpowered in any sense. the IE > ghostblade route on him with armor pen reds is an insane mid game spike where you can melt just about anyone who hasnt built armor.

Statistically, Lucian's midgame is shit tier. http://champion.gg/champion/Lucian

> [{quoted}](name=InsertANameHere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mBpHJ5j4,comment-id=000e000000000002,timestamp=2015-10-01T01:53:02.613+0000)
>
> Statistically, Lucian's midgame is shit tier. http://champion.gg/champion/Lucian

it also says most people are still building him SS second. which to me is good. but not as strong as his IE > Ghostblade spike. I'm just saying. if people played lucian more like what he is an AD Caster rather than just go for an attack speed item second I think people would be a lot more successful.
Because she's the current top-tier ADC that you see in every fucking game, she's the Meta Leader, of course she has a lot of eyes on her.
Don't maim Lucian! That's a hate crime.
This reminds me of the time Lucian was the best ADC in the game.
2 seg Dash, Removes Slows "OP". Meanwhile {{champion:429}}
Let's just hope that the marksman update will buff him in a reasonable way.

As a lucian player - his **early game** harass and sustainability in team fights is weak. After building into an IE though, its all about the double shots after successful skill shots. Those are very rewarding. Tons of poke.

I would recommend a damage increase to his ult or small base damage increase and a small 1 sec CD relief on his E.

I was actually thinking that maybe they could add more scaling to his passive. That's what identifies Lucian. I was thinking maybe a level scaling of 30/35/40/45/50/55/60% scaling of his passive at levels 1/3/6/8/11/13/16. Just to make sure his power gradually grows rather than stagnate from each %AD increase.
I think people underestimate Lucian. He's not as good as he was Pre-Cinder, but he's far from the worst ADC. A good Lucian is still completely able to function and contribute well to a team.

They really should rethink what Lucian's thing is...
He's not really hyper mobile, or all that capable of incredible damage.

Last thing I want on my team is an ADC that falls off late that isn't Mordekaiser...
Thats why Lucian is dead weight if he doesnt win lane, because his kit has a lot of shit in it but he doesn't actually excel at anything.
50 attack range, never forget!
Lucian does a shit ton of early damage. Nuff said.
More so than lots of other ADCs, but not that much more tbh. His Q doesn't do much dmg at all until you get your first big AD item, since it scales off of BONUS AD rather than total :/
King of the Jungle. Kappa
http://ih0.redbubble.net/image.23714961.1120/flat,550x550,075,f.u3.jpg

I love playing Sona with Lucian... Ah.. so easy get him fed <3 
Once had an adc go like 21 and 0... it was Perfect.

Just play vayne

if vayne is banned play jinx or kalista

there are only 3 adc's in solo queue
Tristana. Graves. Ashe is viable. Theres more than 3 picks that are viable, lets be real.

I myself have found success with {{champion:51}}  and her aggresive lane bullying
fyi i play at plat elo
I like Caitlyn with an aggressive support like Nami, Karma, Lux, etc to get the most out of abusing her early game but she falls off pretty hard if she's behind.

I dont get that, ppl always say, cait scales weak, but i dont see it, sure u cant 1v1 vayne, but with enough peel and ur sick range,after 4 items u are a horror to the enemy team,since u are always hitting them.

I dont think shes the worst adc late game, if you did dominate your lane then she scales really well BUT if you fall behind even slightly you are screwed since she is a very bad duelist and has lttle utility compared to ashe or jinx.

Lets say you are against graves or vayne. If you get ganked and give a kill to them you are fucked since you will never dream of winning trades or all ins. Caitlyn is completely reliant on her aa's and range for all her damage, if you dont have items she is almost completely worthless.

Thats why I like her with a lane bully support, to make sure you win early game and scale into late game.

I dunno, I feel like Caitlyn is the champion you pick if you want to force a tie in lane. She can't really win a lane against a competent opponent in soloQ and literally nothing definitively beats her.
Bump

Lucian could use some love to his E CD for late game

Maybe make the CD he gets for using his passive with it scale with its level?

oh now we are in "buff lucian pls"
Ok riot would buff lucian he will become broken again like he was because now he is fine

And then riot would nerf him and he will be forgoten for 1 year again
You people..

If Lucian is going to be this popular, I would rather he not be this garbage. He's literally worthless if he ever get's behind, less dominant than other adcs if he get's ahead, and gets outscaled by every adc not named Corki or Kalista. And his early game isn't even good. Vayne, Jinx, and Ashe bully him hard early game ffs.
